messages.title: Welcome
messages.messageTitle:
Welcome to Philanthropy 
University Content Viewer App
messages.message: This app will allow you to download course content to continue your learning experience when not connected to the internet.

messages.title: About the App
messages.message: You can download some or all of the readings, audio, and video for any course you are enrolled in to later view or listen to when not connected to the internet.

messages.title: About the App
messages.message: Participate in the full course experience, assessments and discussions. To complete a course, you must be connected and access the course through a web browser.
